Gene.FullName: PMS1 homolog 2, mismatch repair system component

Classification.Comment: The c.2001delG pathogenic mutation, located in coding exon 11 of the PMS2 gene, results from a deletion of one nucleotide at nucleotide position 2001, causing a translational frameshift with a predicted alternate stop codon (p.I668*). This alteration is expected to result in loss of function by premature protein truncation or nonsense-mediated mRNA decay. As such, this alteration is interpreted as a disease-causing mutation.
